page.title: 07The Hospital
page.content:
For the last hundred years, the life of Exminster has been particulary involved with the very large mental hospital which is on the north-west side or the village. At one time this housed 1600 patients who are mentally ill and it had a staff of nearly a thousand including doctors, nurses, caterers and administrative staff. Many of thes people lived in the village of Exminster.
In 1987 the hospital is to close and the large site - about a square kilometer - is to be developed for housing. All of the patients are to be housed in sheltered housing or in local authority care. Many of the staff will either retire or move to work in Torquay.
